Room.Name: Castle Kayleigh Armory
Room.ShortDescription: This is the armory and weaponsmith's shop in the old castle.
Room.LongDescription: There's nothing left here now but memories and ghosts. stacks of equipment going to waste. Weapons gleam in the dim light, never to be used again. When the duke was murdered, the entire keep was driven into the forest, and everything that wasn't burned was left behind.
